meanings.definition: Emitting a sound of pleasure or satisfaction
meanings.sent1: The aahing kitten enjoyed the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The cozy blanket elicited an aahing response from the child.
meanings.sent3: The delicious cake had everyone aahing with delight.
meanings.sent4: The breathtaking view left us all aahing in wonder.
meanings.sent5: The aahing crowd cheered as the fireworks lit up the sky.

meanings.definition: Making a vocal expression of relief or relaxation
meanings.sent1: Aahing, finally the weekend has arrived!
meanings.sent2: Aahing, that massage was so relaxing.
meanings.sent3: Aahing, I can finally kick back and unwind.
meanings.sent4: Aahing, the stress just melted away.
meanings.sent5: Aahing, what a relief to be done with work for the day!
